page.title: 09PLAYGROUND GAMES IN G'M
page.content: These are 3 of the games which 11 year olds like to play in the school playground. British Bulldog:10 children line up.The child who is "on" stands in the middle of the playground and calls the name of one in the line.That child has to run across the playground.If he is caught he is "on" with the person in the middle.If he is not caught the others run across the playground.The first of these to be caught is "on". Boneo:a game for at least 6.Two children are "on".One stands at the wall,the other chases the rest.When one is caught he has to put his hand up against the wall.The one who is "on"stops the others from going under it. Tennis squash:a game for 2,with 2 racquets and ball. Players take it in turns to hit ball against wall
